actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to repeal the requirement added by the Deficit Reduction Act of 1984, (P.L. 98-369), relating to the maintenance of contemporaneous records with respect to business use of automobiles and certain other property.

summary.text: Repeals the requirement added by the Deficit Reduction Act of 1984 relating to the maintenance of contemporaneous records with respect to: (1) business travel, including automobile expenses; (2) business entertainment expenses; and (3) expenses for gifts.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the requirement added by the Deficit Reduction Act of 1984, (P.L. 98-369), relating to the maintenance of contemporaneous records with respect to business use of automobiles and certain other property.
